author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how Ubuntu's decision to use core utilities written in Rust (uutils) is causing various issues in the distro that could take a long time to completely fix and will likely lead to random bugs like the issue with automatic updates for a while to come.

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

title: Rust Core Utils Are Breaking Ubuntu
